blocks.value: Distribute 3 points across these stats, increasing the stat by one as you add points to it. You may also decrease a stat into the negatives to gain additional points(1:1 ratio), or sacrifice a trait slot for two points. Stat numbers must be between -3 and 4.

blocks.value: Raw strength, use physicality to get what you want. Break bones and breach windows

blocks.label: Info Text
blocks.value: Every time you fail a check, add one persistence point. After a check, you may decide to expend a persistence point to add a 1d4-1 to the result.
